Without referring specifically to the EU move, Alassane Ouattara was cautious when asked whether he would support any future trade measures including an embargo on cocoa exports. All the measures we back should target those responsible for the situation: Mr. Laurent Gbagbo, his government, his entourage... But I want to spare the large majority of the population, he told Reuters in an interview.`` So, yes to economic sanctions. But let's study over what time period and against whom, so as not to make the situation worse,''

The company said Larry Page would take over from 4 April when Eric Schmidt will become executive chairman focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships . Eric Schmidt has led the company since 2001 alongsidLarry Page and his co-founder Sergey Brin . Larry Page said:`` Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves.

The ballroom at the Conservative Political Action Conference was divided Thursday between boos and cheers as two Republican giants faced the crowd. Former Vice George W. Bush Dick Cheney , a surprise guest, presented former Defense Secretary Donald Rumsfeld with the Defender of the Constitution Award at the annual conference of conservatives which this year has gained significance for being a cattle-call for potential GOP George W. staff Chicago White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle is raising eyebrows over his recent comments about Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who has bounced back after being jailed for his role in a dogfighting ring in 2007. He had a great year and a great comeback, but there were times where we watched the game, and I know it's bad to say, but there were times where we hope he gets hurt, Mark Buehrle , an animal-rights activist, told MLB.com Wednesday for a story focusing on the work he and his wife do with animals.
